file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 34-61-02-04 - FMS (HONEYWELL) CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FMS (HONEYWELL) CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the control display unit (CDU) of FMS1 and/or FMS2. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH FMS CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT (CDU) - RE- 34-61-02-000-801-A HONEYWELL MOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH FMS CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT (CDU) - IN- 34-61-02-400-801-A HONEYWELL STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 34-61-02 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-61-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL 2. CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT (CDU) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the control display unit (CDU) of FMS1 and/or FMS2. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit 224 Cockpit C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) (Aircraft with single FMS) On the circuit breaker panel, open the CDU (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/CDU) circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (2) (Aircraft with dual FMS) On the circuit breaker panel, open the CDU1 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/CDU1) and/or CDU2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/NAV/CDU2) circuit breaker(s) and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it (them). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Unlock the four Dzus fasteners (4) which attach the control display unit (CDU) (1) to the control pedestal (3). (2) Carefully pull the control display unit (CDU) (1) to get access to the electrical connector (2). (3) Disconnect the three electrical connectors (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-61-02 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (4) Remove the control display unit (CDU) (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 34-61-02 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 34-61-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH FMS HONEYWELL 3. CONTROL DISPLAY UNIT (CDU) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the control display unit (CDU) of FMS1 and/or FMS2. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION FLIGHT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM (FMS) - OPERA- AMM TASK 34-61-00-700-801-A/500 TIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 Cockpit 224 Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (2) to the control display unit (CDU) (1). (2) Put the control display unit (CDU) (1) in the control pedestal (3). (3) Lock the four Dzus fasteners (4). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) (Aircraft with single FMS) On the circuit breaker panel, close the CDU (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/CDU) circuit breaker and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-61-02 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) (Aircraft with dual FMS) On the circuit breaker panel, close the CDU1 (Location tip: DC BUS 1/NAV/CDU1) and/or CDU2 (Location tip: DC BUS 2/NAV/CDU2) circuit breaker(s) and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from it (them). (3) Do the FMS Operational Test ( AMM TASK 34-61-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 34-61-02 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
